page.title: 15THE GHOST OF BISHAM ABBEY.
page.content: Bisham Abbey is thought to be haunted by the ghost of Dame Elizabeth Hoby. She was born in 1527, and died at the age of 82. She had been married twice. Her first husband left her with 4 children. In 1573 she married Lord John Russel and had 3 more children: Thomas, Anna and Elizabeth. Elizabeth Hoby was a very powerful and intelligent woman. She could speak 4 languages, and did not enjoy the company of those less intelligent than herself. Her daughter, Anna, was very clever, but unfortunately Thomas was not. It is said that she used to whip her son because he often got things wrong, and that one day her whipping caused his death. It is not certain that she did this, but people believe that she haunts the Abbey to punish those who called her a murderess.
